sentences.en: All parts of the yew tree are poisonous, including the berries.
sentences.cn: 紫杉的各个部分都有毒，包括浆果。

sentences.en: And never a spray of yew.
At present the wild yew the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 目前,野生红豆杉已濒临灭绝.

sentences.en: Conifer hedge such as yew, juniper, redwood, etc.
sentences.cn: 针叶树篱,如紫杉 、 刺柏 、 红木等.

sentences.en: Conifer shrub style such as juniper, yew, pine, etc.
sentences.cn: 针叶灌木类,如刺柏 、 紫杉 、 松树等.

sentences.en: In particular, the yew film in this growth is very rare.
sentences.cn: 尤其红豆杉在此成片生长实属罕见.

sentences.en: Lee Kuan - yew contemplates retiring with a hand on the helm.
sentences.cn: 李光耀打算退位而依然听政.

sentences.en: Lee Kuan Yew still likes to jerk the strings backstage in Singapore.
sentences.cn: 新加坡的李光耀依然喜欢在幕后操纵大局.

sentences.en: Please yew title, age, or occupation on the tom.
sentences.cn: 请在表格里填上姓名年龄和职业.

sentences.en: Spot leaf yew podocarpus face of blade has white spot.
sentences.cn: 斑叶罗汉松,叶面有白色斑点.

sentences.en: The leaves of yew trees are poisonous to cattle.
The occurrence of Mr Lee Kuan Yew is something of an oddity.
sentences.cn: 李光耀的出现是个异数.

sentences.en: Three men robbed a bank in Yew York last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚有三个人抢劫了纽约的一家银行.

sentences.en: Yew trees grow in parts of the Forbidden Forest.
sentences.cn: 在禁林的部分地方种植有紫杉树.

sentences.en: Yew trees grow in the churchyard at Little Hangleton ( GF 32 ).
sentences.cn: 在小汉格顿的墓地中种植有紫杉树 ( GF32 ).

phrases.tran_cn: n. 李光耀（新加坡政治领导人）

trans.tran_en: a tree with dark green leaves and red berries, or the wood of this tree
